snippet.title: My Memory of Us Life's Little Pleasures: Waltzing on Ice
snippet.description:
When life gives you lemons, make a lemonade. Enjoy every day you spend with her and look for small pleasures and gems hidden among walls, decrees, and exclusion.

My Memory of Us is a reminiscence of a friendship between a boy and a girl. A friendship made during tough times. Times of terror, pain, and exclusion in a world where people were forced to live in two artificially detached worlds.
More info about the game:
www.mymemoryofus.com
Facebook: @MyMemoryOfUs
Twitter: @MyMemoryOfUs
Instagram: @MyMemoryOfUs
media@jugglergames.com
Juggler Games
